p.codeblock: virtual int loadExtensionProvider(const char* path, bool unload_after_use = false) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|RtcEngineProxy") int LoadExtensionProvider(FString path, bool unload_after_use);
public abstract int LoadExtensionProvider(string path, bool unload_after_use = false);
Future<void> loadExtensionProvider( {required String path, bool unloadAfterUse = false});

section.p: This method is used to add extensions external to the SDK (such as those from Extensions Marketplace and SDK extensions) to the SDK.

section.title: Call timing
section.p: Make sure the is initialized before you call this method.

section.title: Restrictions
section.p: If you want to load multiple extensions, you need to call this method multiple times.
section.note: This method is for Android only.
This method applies to Windows only.

plentry.pd: The extension library path and name. For example: /library/libagora_segmentation_extension.dll.

Whether to uninstall the current extension when you no longer using it:
: Uninstall the extension when the is destroyed.
: (Rcommended) Do not uninstall the extension until the process terminates.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: native unreal bp electron unity rn cs
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
